{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-AX3000.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX3000/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-AX3000/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-AX3000/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AX3000 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AX3000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 17 January 2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/ASUS_RT-AX3000 |wlclass = AX3000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAXJ300 |icid = 3568A-RTAXJ300 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6750;BCM6750KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 3 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, HE160, OFDMA, MU-MIMO, Beamforming, Agile Multiband, DFS, AiMesh, AiProtection, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.50.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = ASUS_2G, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS-([:]{5}[0-9a-fA-F]{2})$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = AsusWRT-Merlin <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/23/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 159.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BCM43684KFEB; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 2402 |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Encryption: WPA3-PSK, WPA2-PSK, WPA-PSK, WPS support :WPA3-Enterprise, WPA2-Enterprise, WPA-Enterprise
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{See also|ASUS TUF-AX3000|ASUS RT-AX58U|ASUS RT-AX82U}} {{FCC ST|02/19/2020|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://edgeup.asus.com/2019/asus-ces-2019-new-products/ ''See all the new ASUS and ROG gear from CES 2019'' on '''ASUS'''] * [https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20190107005627/en/ASUS-Unveils-Full-Lineup-Gaming-Lifestyle-Innovations ''ASUS Unveils Full Lineup of Gaming at CES 2019'' on '''BusinessWire''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://koolshare.cn/thread-169062-4-1.html ''ASUS TUF Gaming AX3000'' on '''Koolshare'''] (CN) :AX5400 (4804+574 Mbps) • [https://image.koolshare.cn/attachment/forum/201910/01/185220oat3zobtpvbhm2oo.jpg PCB image] <!-- *[https://www.acwifi.net/8109.html ''ASUS TUF-AX3000 Spec'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/8156.html ''ASUS TUF-AX3000 Test'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN)
===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/analisis/routers/asus-rt-ax58u-ax3000/ ''ASUS RT-AX58U AX3000 Router'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) :• CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6750KFEBG (Tri-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1.5GHz WiSoC :• Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF2G189C-TI (256MB NAND TSOP48) :• RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16ER-EK (512MB DDR3-1866 BGA96) :• Wireless: 802.11abgn/ac/ax (Wi-Fi 6) 2.4/5GHz • AX3000 (574+2.402 Mbps) :• WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM6750KFEBG (WiSoC) • 802.11ax 2T2R (574Mbps) :• WLAN 5GHz: [[Broadcom]] BCM43684KFEB • 802.11ax 2T2R (160MHz, 2.402Mbps) :• Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 3.1 (Gen 1) ports :• PSU: DC 19V/1.75A -->
